snippet: Aides are working on a bill that would offer illegal immigrants a pathway to citizenship — a measure intended as a backup in case a bipartisan effort by Congress stalls.
abstract: Obama administration is working on comprehensive bill that would offer 11 million illegal immigrants a pathway to citizenship; measure is intended as a backup in case a bipartisan effort by Congress stalls.
lead_paragraph: Aides are working on a bill that would offer illegal immigrants a pathway to citizenship — a measure intended as a backup in case a bipartisan effort by Congress stalls.

headline.seo: White House Continues Work on Its Own Immigration Bill
headline.main: The White House Continues Working on Immigration Legislation of Its Own
headline.print_headline: The White House Continues Working on Immigration Legislation of Its Own
